document_data.mainbody:
The Golem Slayer was an enchanted adamantine warhammer created by Mintassan the Magnificent, a planeswalker from the city of Westgate, active in the late 14 century DR.
When the Golem Slayer was wielded against constructs, it effectively became a +1 enchanted weapon. Additionally, the hammer dealt a small amount of sonic damage to its targets.
This enchanted warhammer was a minor curiosity created by Mintassan the Magnificent to keep "his children" in line. The Golem Slayer name was given to the weapon by its planeswalking creator. In the , the weapon was available for purchase from Mintassans Mysteries in Westgates Market Triangle.
